description:
------------------------------
🎉Blu-ray Pre-Order🎉
"hololive English 1st Concert -Connect the World-" Blu-ray Pre-Order starts at 12.00PM Noon 11/30 JST!📀

Relive the memories of the first ever hololive English live concert in North America 👀✨

🔽Details🔽
https://shop.hololivepro.com/en/products/hololiveen_1stconcert_bluray

#holoENConnect
------------------------------

A group of hololive English talents gather to relive their favorite moments from the "hololive English 1st Concert -Connect the World-", and perhaps even bring us some special news...?!

[Participating talents]
▶Takanashi Kiara
@TakanashiKiara 
https://twitter.com/takanashikiara

▶Mori Calliope
@MoriCalliope 
https://twitter.com/moricalliope

▶IRyS
@IRyS 
https://twitter.com/irys_en

▶FUWAMOCO
@FUWAMOCOch 
https://twitter.com/fuwamoco_en

Follow the official hololive English accounts!
▶Official YouTube channel: @hololiveEnglish 
▶Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/hololivepro_EN
▶Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hololivetv/
▶️Official Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Hololive/

▶Request from hololive production to underage viewers:
Please be sure to check the link below before viewing our content.
https://en.hololive.tv/request-to-minors
title: [Announcement] Favorite Moments From #holoENConnect ! With Special News Too...?!
